# Create Specification

Generate or update project specifications following the Next.js 14 Frontend pattern.

## Instructions

{{file:.github/prompts/create-specification.prompt.md}}

## Usage

Use this command to:

- Generate initial specs.md for new features
- Update existing specifications with implementation details
- Ensure specs follow the established project patterns

## Output

Creates or updates specification documents with:

- Complete tech stack details (Next.js 14, React 18.2, React Query, Ant Design, TypeScript, Tailwind)
- External API endpoint specifications
- Frontend routes and components
- TypeScript types v√† Zod validation schemas
- State management strategy (React Query + Zustand optional)
- Testing strategy (Vitest + Playwright + MSW)
- Deployment configuration (Vercel recommended)
